org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal

类 Kafka010Fetcher<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals.AbstractFetcher<T,org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal.Kafka09Fetcher<T>
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal.Kafka010Fetcher<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of elements produced by the fetcher.

    public class Kafka010Fetcher<T>
extends Kafka09Fetcher<T>
    A fetcher that fetches data from Kafka brokers via the Kafka 0.10 consumer API.

    This fetcher re-uses basically all functionality of the 0.9 fetcher. It only additionally takes the KafkaRecord-attached timestamp and attaches it to the Flink records.

    • 字段概要
